data.name: Galactic Diner
data.detailed_description:
Serve alien customers and become the best chef in the galaxy! A fast-paced, minigame-based RPG about a galaxy-wide cooking tournament.

A tournament of GALACTIC proportions!


Cook your way through dozens of cafes and climb your way to the top! Make friends with diners, satisfy their weird requests, and keep them coming back!

With over 50 different types of requests and 10,000 different questions, you'll never know what to expect. Customers' requests will evolve and adapt to your playstyle! Between flipping pancakes, fixing a cake, and finding someone's lost dumplings... the stars are the limit!

Hungry for more?

  • Dozens of crazy diners! Cook inside a hot pot, underwater, in a bakery, and more
  • Go head-to-head against a cast of other chefs in fast-paced Duel Rounds
  • Unlock Side Dishes, special levels with crazy twists! If you can make it through, you'll be rewarded...
  • Replay levels to unlock trophies and shoot for the highest score you can

An Alien World


Explore an expansive resort between rounds of the tournament. There's a surprise around every corner! Get to know the other chefs better, help out hundreds of different customers... and don't forget to try the food! I heard there's even a secret club for gourmets only...

Not your cup of tea? There's a capsule machine, an arcade, a garden, a fortune-teller, a secret fishing spot, and much more to discover!

Five-Star Service


There's plenty more to buy and discover as you make your way through the tournament:

  • Upgrades to sharpen your skills in the kitchen
  • Dozens of equippable pins with varied benefits. Many pins evolve into even better versions
  • All kinds of furniture to customize the resort, from arcade cabinets to music players
  • Hats and haircuts, so you can provide service in style
  • Over 100 foods, from pizza and toast to alien treats
  • ...and much more!

data.short_description: Become the best chef in the galaxy! Cook for aliens, make new friends, and go head-to-head against other chefs to win it all in a game show where the customer is always right!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ (or later)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+ with SSE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+ with SSE
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04+ (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel/AMD at 2GHz+ with SSE
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics 4400 or better
